attributes.action: Thoroughly investigate EVERY ministers expense claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The fact that the speaker has resigned is not the end of the story. I ask that every minister's expenses claims over the last 6 years be closely scrutinised, and any suspicion of fraudulent claims should be reported to the Crown Prosecution Service to consider prosecution.
Paying back fraudulent claims is not permitted to the public and the same rule must apply to ministers at all levels

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
